title: The Flare
description: Based on the novels of TJ Whitford. A solar flare wipes out all of technology and everyone’s memories, except for Chester Hastings, an unlikely hero.
parent: What Just Happened??! with Fred Savage
altHero: a young black girl with one glowing, gold eye
alt2: pregnant black woman in pain, holding her ear as sparks fly nearby
alt3: young black boy in a white void
alt4: Shiri Appleby as Lisa, standing in front of a mural of Chester
